properties.displayName: Removal Of AMSI Provider Registry Keys
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (ActionType in~ ("RegistryKeyDeleted", "RegistryValueDeleted")) and (RegistryKey endswith "{2781761E-28E0-4109-99FE-B9D127C57AFE}" or RegistryKey endswith "{A7C452EF-8E9F-42EB-9F2B-245613CA0DC9}")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the deletion of AMSI provider registry key entries in HKLM\Software\Microsoft\AMSI. This technique could be used by an attacker in order to disable AMSI inspection.
